statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_records
SELECT record_id, regulation, record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE regulation='GDPR'
SELECT record_id, regulation, record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE record_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT regulation, COUNT(*) as num_records FROM compliance_records GROUP BY regulation
SELECT record_id, regulation, record_date FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC
SELECT record_id, regulation, record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE regulation='HIPAA' ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY record_id ASC;
SELECT regulation, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM compliance_records GROUP BY regulation HAVING num_records > 1 ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT record_id, regulation, SUBSTRING(document, 1, 50) AS document_preview FROM compliance_records WHERE regulation='GDPR' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT AVG(record_id) AS avg_record_id, MAX(record_date) AS max_record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE regulation='CCPA';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records;
SELECT record_id, record_name, compliance_status FROM compliance_records;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documentation WHERE record_id = 100;
SELECT record_name, regulation_name FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM documentation ORDER BY document_type DESC, doc_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT record_name, regulation_name FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT document_name, document_type, document_link FROM documentation WHERE doc_id = 3;
SELECT record_id, record_name FROM compliance_records WHERE regulation_name = 'GDPR' ORDER BY record_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM documentation JOIN compliance_records ON documentation.record_id = compliance_records.record_id WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records;
SELECT record_name, date_of_creation FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_level > 2;
SELECT regulation_name, enactment_date FROM regulations ORDER BY enactment_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, event_type, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE event_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records JOIN regulations ON compliance_records.compliance_level = regulations.regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_level > 3 ORDER BY date_of_creation DESC;
SELECT record_name, compliance_level FROM compliance_records WHERE date_of_creation > '2022-01-01' AND compliance_level < 5;
SELECT regulation_name, enactment_date FROM regulations WHERE compliance_deadline <= '2023-12-31' ORDER BY enactment_date;
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE event_type = 'Login' AND event_date >= '2022-06-01' AND event_date < '2022-07-01';
SELECT record_name, date_of_creation FROM compliance_records WHERE compliance_level = 5 AND date_of_creation BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records;
SELECT record_date, regulatory_body FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Audit';

SELECT regulatory_bodies.body_name, regulatory_bodies.body_description, compliance_records.record_type FROM regulatory_bodies INNER JOIN compliance_records ON regulatory_bodies.body_name = compliance_records.regulatory_body;
SELECT document_name FROM documents WHERE LENGTH(document_content) > 0;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_result FROM audits ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT record_id, regulatory_body, record_type FROM compliance_records;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_bodies ORDER BY body_name ASC;
SELECT record_id, record_date, record_description FROM compliance_records WHERE regulatory_body = 'FDA';
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy' ORDER BY document_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM audits WHERE audit_result = 'Failed' AND audit_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT record_id, description FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Violation';
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE username = 'admin' AND action = 'Login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT regulation_title, effective_date FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT full_name, position FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE record_type = 'Audit';
SELECT record_date, record_type, description FROM compliance_records WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01' AND regulation_code IN ('ABC', 'DEF') ORDER BY record_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, full_name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' OR position = 'Manager' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT timestamp, username, action, details FROM audit_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT regulation_title, description, effective_date FROM regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY effective_date DESC;
